resources.string: This app aims to provide a clear introduction on how to use the script, beside some mandatory basic information.
Hello / good afternoon, this is Linda smith working with Medicare patients / seniors, how are you doing today?
Good morning / afternoon, this is Linda Smith I\'m a health care specialist working with Medicare beneficiaries. how are you today?
The reason for the call today is to update your medical profile on the system
Well actually we are giving you this call as a free health service provided to you since you have Medicare
I\'m giving you a call cuz it shows here in your medical profile on the database system that you have arthritis in your hands and feet, does it go anywhere else?
I\'m giving you a call today cuz I\'m updating your profile on the database system and i need to make sure have you received your brace which is covered by Medicare or not yet.
I believe I\'m speaking to MRS/Jean gray \n(Wait for the first yes) \nAnd your over the age of 65 and have Medicare, right?
As it shows to me here that you are having arthritis pain in your hands and in your feet which affects your shoulders and your back too, right?
As it shows to me here under your name that you have pain symptoms in your back and knees, right?

Medicare is helping you, it covers for you the latest version of the elastic back support, which you need to wear it only for 30 minutes a day, it will help relive any pain and support your back during any daily activity. Totally at no cost to you, covered by Medicare.

Well I\'m sorry that you are in pain, so actually i just need to check have you received your back and knee braces covered by Medicare or not yey?\nIf no \nWell i really apologize for this, but actually let me inform you that you will be receiving a back brace and knee brace Totally covered by Medicare and under your doctor\'s supervision within the next few days right to your door step.
It\'s made from synthetic fibers and fabrics, you can wear it under or on your cloth, it doesn\'t have any metal parts inside it, we make sure that you are not allergic to any of the materials.

Back brace\nThis is the latest version of the back brace which is designed to provide spinal support to relieve lower back pain as it will lift the pressure from your lumbar disc resulting in a pressure free spine, it\'s going to eliminate the pain within only 30 minutes, it provides postural support for your back muscles and your spine and maximizes immobilization without sacrificing comfort and it will be totally covered to you by medicare as a benefit through your insurance company so you will not pay anything for it.

Knee brace\nThis is the latest version of the knee braces which is going to eliminate the pain from your knees, it\'s going to stabilize your knee cap, it\'s going to support your knees and your whole body whenever you are doing any kind of activities during the day, it\'s going to improve your blood circulation and it will be totally covered to you by Medicare so you will not pay anything for it.

So, what I'm gonna do now, I'll check your eligibility on the Medicare system. I've here your first name as Jean and your last name as gray, right?
(Wait for the yes) 
Could you please verify your date of birth?
Okay and your are still located at 123 Black road st, NY
(Wait for the yes)
 Now i need you to verify your Medicare claim number.

I have been receiving calls for a year and i never received anything :\nLet me check something, is your number 123456789. well actually when i put your number on the system here it shows that this is the first time we are calling you, so it wasn\'t us who have been calling you, and i assure you this time you will be receiving the support with the up next couple of weeks.

Do you have the name of my doctor? : \nWell we are only allowed to access your profile to know your part B is activated or not and according to the procedures a Back Brace specialist will give you a call tomorrow and he will take care of that cuz everything has to be through your doctor\'s office since that he is the only one who knows more about the pain you are going through and he is the only one who will decide either tha support is gonna help you or not.

I have to talk to my doctor first : \nBecause we know that your doctor knows well about your pain and understands what you are going through, he will be the only one to decide wither the support is gonna help you or not with the pain you have so according to the procedures we have to go through and one of the most important steps we have to take is we send your paper work to your doctor in order to take his permission first, so don\'t worry we can\'t send you the support without your doctor\'s approval.

My claim is the same as my social and i don\'t give my social out :\nAs you know every senior under Medicare has part A and part B, part B is responsible for the medical equipments, so in order to access you profile and make sure your part B is activated i need you to verify your claim number. i don\'t care if it\'s the same as your social or not, i just need the nine digits followed by a letter on your red white and blue card.

Before the recording to not face any issue in the recording :\n Know according to Medicare regulations I\'m going to put you on a very brief short recording to save your rights and to make sure we have all the correct information\'s by your own voice, OK?

Patient has HMO plan :\nGreat we are done, one of the verification department will call you with in the up next month in order to finalize the process with you and take your measurements, thank you sire and have a good day.

You are 100% eligible to receive your free brace, now according to Medicare regulations I\'m going to put you on a very brief short recording to save your rights. I\'m gonna recap all your information so please answer me with clear answers and pretend this is the first time I\'m talking to you.
